Detailed Description

Room class.

Objects of this class are used in room-portal system. These objects can not be drew, they are used only for computing, but room contain list of 3D objects, which belong to this room and can be drew.

void CheckNearRooms (  ObjRef< Room >  room,
ObjRef< Portal >  clip_portal,
vector< ObjRef< Room > > &  vis_rooms
)  [related]
 

Checks visibility of rooms from given room.

All visible rooms will add to the list of visible rooms and will check their "checked" flag.

Parameters:
room - first given room.
clip_portal - clipping portal (for first call may be NULL)
vis_rooms - list of visible rooms.

void DrawFromRoom (  ObjRef< Room >  start_room,
vector< ObjRef< Room > >  rooms
)  [related]
 

Draws all visible rooms in given list of rooms.

Searching start from given start room.

Parameters:
start_room - start room.
rooms - list of rooms for searching.

Draws all visible rooms in given list of rooms.

Searching start from rooms linked to the given start portal.

ObjRef< Portal > FindCrossPortal (  ObjRef< Room >  room,
const Vector3fx &  pos,
const Fixed &  radius
)  [related]
 

Finds portal, that is in given radius from given point in given room.

Parameters:
room - room for portal searching.
pos - point (sphere center).
radius - radius (sphere center).
Returns:
Returns pointer to found portal. If portal is not found, return NULL.
